segments.text: Peeking into this scene, the kitchen feels lived-in and warm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the counter and sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying dishes, her back to the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Trouble being the overflowing sink, water cascading down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making a puddle that's spreading fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea, foot in the water already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the other side, a boy climbs for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool doesn't look stable at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's risking a fall just for treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl helps by reaching up too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is perfect, no hint of the indoor hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one's noticing this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It'll end in tears, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR
